trophies.trophyDetail: This is the ultimate trophy, awarded to players who have unlocked all the other trophies in the game. It represents their complete mastery of the game’s mechanics, their dedication to achieving all of its goals, and their status as true champions of the virtual arena.

This trophy commemorates the player’s first official match in the game. It represents the courage and determination needed to step onto the virtual field for the first time and start their journey towards greatness.
This trophy celebrates the player’s first goal in the game. It represents the joy and excitement of scoring, and the hard work and skill needed to make it happen.
This trophy recognizes the player’s first loss in the game. It represents the importance of resilience and perseverance in the face of defeat, and the learning opportunities that come with failure.
Player buy 5 stickers
This trophy honors the player’s first customization of their vehicle with a sticker. It represents their creativity and individuality, and their desire to make their vehicle their own.
This trophy celebrates the player’s purchase of the shark hat, a whimsical accessory that adds personality to their avatar. It represents the player’s sense of humor and lightheartedness.
This trophy recognizes the player’s use of Nitro 100 times, a feat that demonstrates their mastery of the game’s mechanics. It represents their ambition and dedication to becoming the best.

This trophy commemorates the player’s first win in a 1v1 game, a test of their individual skill and strategy. It represents their ability to work independently and make smart decisions under pressure.

This trophy celebrates the player’s first win in a 2v2 game, a challenge that requires teamwork and coordination. It represents their ability to collaborate and communicate effectively with a partner.
This trophy honors the player’s first win in a 3v3 game, a high-stakes battle that demands a range of skills and abilities. It represents their versatility and adaptability as a player.
This trophy recognizes the player’s achievement of winning 5 Team Death Matches. It represents their growth and improvement as a player, and their ability to contribute to their team’s success.

This trophy celebrates the player’s accomplishment of killing 30 enemies in Team Death Match, a feat that requires sharp reflexes and accurate aim. It represents their prowess as a fighter and their ability to dominate the battlefield.

This trophy acknowledges the player’s exceptional skill in scoring 5 goals in a single match, a rare achievement that sets them apart from their peers. It represents their mastery of the game’s mechanics and their strategic thinking.

This trophy honors the player’s ascent to level 10, a milestone that reflects their dedication and progress in the game. It represents their commitment to improving their skills and achieving their goals.

This trophy recognizes the player’s ability to win a Team Death Match without using missiles or grenades, a test of their strategic thinking and creativity. It represents their commitment to fair play and their desire to win on their own terms.
This trophy acknowledges the player’s resilience in the face of adversity, having lost 5 matches in a row. It represents their determination to overcome obstacles and learn from their mistakes.

This trophy represents the player’s conquest of all the stadiums available in the game. It reflects their global dominance and their desire to leave their mark on every corner of the virtual world. It’s a symbol of their ambition and their willingness to go above and beyond to achieve their goals.
This trophy honors the player’s acquisition of all the cars available in the game. It represents their passion for the game and their desire to collect everything it has to offer.
This trophy recognizes the player’s victory in 20 matches, a significant milestone that demonstrates their dominance in the game. It represents their tenacity and skill in the face of competition.
Player level is more than 25

This trophy acknowledges the player’s purchase of 5 complete sets of wheels, an impressive display of style and flair. It represents their creativity and attention to detail in crafting their virtual persona.
